alert.note: Alert for Morgan (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 06 at 3:30PM EDT until May 09 at 3:49AM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Baltimore MD/Washington DC has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in West Virginia... Cacapon River near Great Cacapon affecting Morgan County. For the Cacapon River...including Great Cacapon...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING TO EARLY MONDAY MORNING... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD WATCH... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cacapon River near Great Cacapon. * WHEN...From Saturday morning to early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Kilgore Road is flooded in multiple spots. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:30 PM EDT Friday the stage was 5.1 feet, or 3.9 feet below flood stage. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning to a crest of 10.9 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage late Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 10.9 feet on 04/28/1973. - Please visit https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood for flood safety information. && River Name Fld Observed Fri Sat Sat Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time 8PM 2AM 8AM Stg Time Date Cacapon River Great Cacapon 9.0 5.1 Fri 2 pm 5.2 6.4 8.3 10.9 8pm Sat &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/washington or www.weather.gov/baltimore. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 330 AM EDT.
